Getting Started with n8n

n8n is a powerful workflow automation tool that allows you to connect different services and automate tasks.

Installation

You can install n8n using npm:

npm install -g n8n

Quick Start

Make sure you have Node.js version 16 or higher installed.

  1. Install n8n globally
  2. Run n8n command
  3. Open your browser to http://localhost:5678

Creating Your First Workflow

To create your first workflow:

Step Action
1 Click the "+" button to add a node
2 Select a trigger node
3 Configure the node settings

Important Note

Always test your workflows before deploying to production.

For more information, visit the Nodes documentation.
